return_reasons.name: Unknown
return_reasons.description: The reason for the return has not been specified or could not be determined.

return_reasons.name: Changed my mind
return_reasons.description: The customer no longer wants the item after purchasing it, regardless of product quality or accuracy.

return_reasons.name: Item not as described
return_reasons.description: The product does not match the description, images, or specifications provided in the listing.

return_reasons.name: Received the wrong item
return_reasons.description: The customer received a different product than what was ordered or expected.

return_reasons.name: Other
return_reasons.description: The reason for the return does not fit into any of the predefined categories.

return_reasons.name: Damaged or defective
return_reasons.description: The item arrived with physical damage, manufacturing defects, or does not function as intended.

return_reasons.name: Too small
return_reasons.description: The item's dimensions are smaller than required for the customer's fit or space.

return_reasons.name: Too big
return_reasons.description: The item's dimensions are larger than required for the customer's fit or space.

return_reasons.name: Style
return_reasons.description: The design, cut, or aesthetic character of the item does not suit the customer's personal taste.

return_reasons.name: Color
return_reasons.description: The hue, shade, or visual appearance of the item does not match the customer's preference or expectation.

return_reasons.name: Absorbency
return_reasons.description: The material's capacity to soak up and retain liquid is insufficient or excessive.

return_reasons.name: Academic level
return_reasons.description: The complexity or depth of the content is not suitable for the customer's educational needs.

return_reasons.name: Accuracy
return_reasons.description: The measurements or data provided by the device are not precise enough.

return_reasons.name: Adhesion
return_reasons.description: The product does not create a secure initial bond with the intended surface.

return_reasons.name: Adhesive
return_reasons.description: The sticking properties of the product are not suitable for the intended use.

return_reasons.name: Adhesive strength
return_reasons.description: The adhesive's holding power is insufficient or excessive for the intended load or stress.

return_reasons.name: Adjustability
return_reasons.description: The item cannot be modified or resized sufficiently to suit the customer's needs.

return_reasons.name: Age range
return_reasons.description: The recommended age group for the item does not align with the intended user.

return_reasons.name: Amperage
return_reasons.description: The electrical current rating is unsuitable for the customer's device or system requirements.

return_reasons.name: Angle
return_reasons.description: The degree of inclination or bend does not match the customer's requirements.

return_reasons.name: Animal refused
return_reasons.description: The animal would not use or consume the product.

return_reasons.name: Application
return_reasons.description: The required method for applying the product is unforgiving, overly complex, or prone to user error.

return_reasons.name: Applicator
return_reasons.description: The provided tool distributes the product in an uneven or uncontrolled way.

return_reasons.name: Arrived late
return_reasons.description: The delivery occurred after the expected date or required time.

return_reasons.name: Assortment
return_reasons.description: The variety of items included in the package is not what the customer wanted.

return_reasons.name: Baby refused
return_reasons.description: The infant would not use or accept the item.

return_reasons.name: Balance
return_reasons.description: The distribution of weight within the item affects its handling or stability in an undesirable way.

return_reasons.name: Band rolls down
return_reasons.description: The garment does not stay in place and slides down the body.

return_reasons.name: Band too big
return_reasons.description: The circumference of the band is excessive, preventing a secure fit on the body.

return_reasons.name: Band too small
return_reasons.description: The circumference of the band is insufficient, causing constriction against the body.

return_reasons.name: Barrel size
return_reasons.description: The diameter of the curling iron or tool is not the right size for the desired effect.

return_reasons.name: Battery life
return_reasons.description: The duration the device operates on a single charge does not meet the customer's expectations.

return_reasons.name: Blade type
return_reasons.description: The specific style or edge of the blade is not suitable for the customer's use.

return_reasons.name: Board volume
return_reasons.description: The displacement volume of the board provides insufficient or excessive buoyancy for the user's weight.

return_reasons.name: Bounce
return_reasons.description: The rebound capability of the item is either too high or too low for the activity.

return_reasons.name: Breathability
return_reasons.description: The material does not allow moisture to pass through, causing overheating or a clammy feel.

return_reasons.name: Brightness
return_reasons.description: The intensity of light emitted or reflected by the item does not meet the customer's preference.

return_reasons.name: Bristles too coarse

return_reasons.name: Bristles too soft
return_reasons.description: The brush is too gentle for the intended task.

return_reasons.name: Bubble output
return_reasons.description: The quantity or size of the bubbles produced is not as expected.

return_reasons.name: Budget
return_reasons.description: The cost of the service exceeds the customer's financial constraints.

return_reasons.name: Buoyancy
return_reasons.description: The item's ability to float or support weight in water does not meet the customer's needs.

return_reasons.name: Burn rate
return_reasons.description: The rate at which the item is consumed by burning is either faster or slower than expected.

return_reasons.name: Burn time
return_reasons.description: The duration of the item's burn is shorter or longer than expected.

return_reasons.name: Buttons not accessible
return_reasons.description: The case or cover blocks the device controls, preventing use.

return_reasons.name: Caffeine level
return_reasons.description: The concentration of caffeine in the product is too high or too low for the user.

return_reasons.name: Calibration

return_reasons.name: Capacity

return_reasons.name: Charging speed
return_reasons.description: The device takes too long to replenish its battery.

return_reasons.name: Clarity

return_reasons.name: Cleaning

return_reasons.name: Closeness

return_reasons.name: Cold duration

return_reasons.name: Comfort

return_reasons.name: Compartments

return_reasons.name: Connectivity

return_reasons.name: Consistency

return_reasons.name: Cushioning

return_reasons.description: The integrated key or combination lock mechanism is defective or does not function as expected.

return_reasons.name: Magnification too strong
return_reasons.description: The level of enlargement provided is excessive, causing distortion or discomfort.

return_reasons.name: Magnification too weak
return_reasons.description: The level of enlargement provided is insufficient for the customer's vision needs.

return_reasons.name: Mounting difficulty
return_reasons.description: The process of attaching the item to a wall or other surface is overly difficult, complex, or the instructions are unclear.

return_reasons.name: Ripeness
return_reasons.description: The maturity of the produce is not at the desired stage for consumption.

return_reasons.name: Suction strength
return_reasons.description: The force of the vacuum seal is either too weak or too strong for the intended use.

return_reasons.name: Sweetness
return_reasons.description: The level of sugar or sweet flavor in the product does not match the customer's taste.

return_reasons.name: Uncomfortable
return_reasons.description: The general physical sensation of using the product causes discomfort.
